name: Philips
brief_description: Philips is a health technology company that aims to improve people's health and well-being through meaningful innovation. Their goal is to improve 2.5 billion lives per year by 2030, including 400 million in underserved communities.
services: Healthcare, Medical Devices, Health systems, Cardiology, Healthtech, Oncology, Respiratory, Fertility, pregnancy, and Connected Care
